reccos.name: RECCOS — Simple access to real estate ownership
reccos.desc: RECCOS allows anyone to invest in Dubai's booming real estate market from as little as AED 2,000 by buying real, registered property fractions. You become a co-owner of a tangible asset with full transparency and traceability of your share.

ownership.name: Real and certified ownership
ownership.desc: Every RECCOS property is officially registered in Dubai. When you invest, you receive a title deed and an ownership certificate corresponding to your contribution. You don't hold a digital promise — you hold a legal, verifiable proof of ownership.

marketplace.name: An open and liquid marketplace
marketplace.desc: The RECCOS Marketplace lets you buy or resell your shares freely, depending on your goals. You can exit whenever you wish, without waiting for the global sale of the property, and take advantage of real-time market appreciation.

noor.name: Noor — your intelligent personal assistant
noor.desc: Noor is your dedicated AI assistant. She searches for properties that match your goals, automates recurring investments, and can act on your behalf when the right opportunity appears. If you authorize monthly investments, Noor finds the best balance between potential and stability, managing your capital with precision and transparency.

whyDubai.name: Why Dubai ?
whyDubai.desc: Dubai's real estate market continues to break records: 2024: AED 761 billion in transactions (+27 % YoY). H1 2025: AED 431 billion in deals (+26 % in volume). Over 90,000 active investors yearly. A stable, global hub offering growth, liquidity, and international accessibility — the ideal environment for fractional ownership.

howItWorks.name: How it works ?
howItWorks.desc: Choose a property — or let Noor find one for you. Invest any amount from AED 2,000 upward. Track your ownership and market updates in real time. Resell your shares anytime through the RECCOS Marketplace. A seamless digital experience, with no complex paperwork.

security.name: Security, transparency, and peace of mind
security.desc: Every property is legally registered, and all documents are verifiable and accessible. RECCOS ensures total transparency of ownership, transactions, and records. Your assets are protected, your ownership is documented, and your peace of mind is our priority.

featuredLaunch.title: Emerald Dunes | Palm West
featuredLaunch.description: A levitating penthouse with 1,800 m² of terraces, a suspended mirror pool, and a 270° panoramic suite. Private access to the RECCOS Sky Club and 24/7 Gulfstream concierge.
featuredLaunch.notificationSubtitle: Secure your priority pass to the private launch.
